title: 1X launches world model enabling NEO robot to learn tasks by watching videos
description:
With this update, 1X Technologies' NEO uses internet-scale video data tuned on robot data to perform AI tasks.

The post 1X launches world model enabling NEO robot to learn tasks by watching videos appeared first on The Robot Report.
